T02D3013:65b-0: @65b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3013:65b-1: sna'i nad gso bar byed par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa
T02D3013:65b-2: po dam tshig dang ldan pas khrus kyi cho ga
T02D3013:65b-3: lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad byas te /
T02D3013:65b-4: de nas rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi nga rgyal du
T02D3013:65b-5: gnas pa'i thugs ka'i sa bon las 'od snga ma
T02D3013:65b-6: ltar 'phros pa las don gnyis byas ba'i tha ma
T02D3013:65b-7: dri'i lha mo rnams bdag nyid kyi sna la thim
T02D3013:65b-8: pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shangs dri ma med
T02D3013:65b-9: pa yongs su dag pa ye shes tshogs pa'i phung
T02D3013:65b-10: po las grub pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes go ma
T02D3013:65b-11: 'gags pa sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa dang ldan par
T02D3013:65b-12: dmigs shing snying po rgyas bsdus ci rigs bar bzlas
T02D3013:65b-13: so // de ltar sna tshub pa rnams la 'bru mar la bzlas la blugs so //
T02D3013:65b-14: khrag 'bab cing dbugs stong pa bkab na tsandan dkar po la bzlas so //
T02D3013:65b-15: zug che ba rnams la gi wang 'o ma la
T02D3013:65b-16: sbyar ba la bzlas shing sna phug tu blugs so
T02D3013:65b-17: // sna'i dbang po nyams pa dang na ba gso
T02D3013:65b-18: ba dri ma dang bral ba'i sbyong byed ces bya
